Hello, I have the same Problem with the Rocketbuildung. I could fix this with installing a texture compression mod. Now It works perfectly(except the memory leaks, and the crash after a while / I hope this will be fixed soon) greatings Salo
arg active texture management keeps getting caught on "RealChute/parts/cone_chute/RC_cone"

It could be possible that the texture mod crashes(still stands in the info of the mod), by my it crashes two times. After that ksp loaded nicely and the bug was gone away.

So please give the mod a chance and try it a few times until ksp loading correctly(it could work for a time / by me 15 minutes and 2 crashes)
